info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania, northwestern Greenville and northeastern Pickens Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Brevard, or near Table Rock State Park, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Table Rock State Park, Caesars Head State Park, Dupont State Forest, Sunset, Pumpkintown, Sassafras Mountain, Rocky Bottom, Cedar Mountain and Connestee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
